Name: Ally Gory: The Great Mushroom Hunt
About the game: The first indie game offering from Fortuitous Development, LLC, 'Ally Gory: The Great Mushroom Hunt' is a top-down action-adventure game where you play as Ally, a young woman unjustly held in a mental care facility. But Ally has an unusual ability: the power to temporarily escape her confinement, walking through any mirror to be transported into the realm of forest elves who need her help. Play as Ally to solve collect objects, solve puzzles, and fight monsters across over 25 levels to save the elves, as well as herself.
